import React from 'react' const QuoteCard = (props) => { const {quote} = props; console.log(quote) return (
{calculatePercentageOfVotes(qoute.upvotesCount,quotes.downvotesCount).toFixed(0)} %
{quotes.upvotesCount} / {quotes.downvotesCount}

{quotes.content}

-{quotes.author}
) } export default QuoteCard
